thread.section_title: Frames Direct Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Frames Direct | www.framesdirect.com | 13 of 657
thread.title: Maher

author: Maher
title: Maher
text: The staff at Frames Direct were responsive to my communications. They were also true to their promise to honor a price match. Shortly after I purchased my frames from them, I came across another vendor that offered the same frame for much less. I called them, provided them with the website where I found the lower-priced item, they immediately checked and issued me a refund to my credit card. They were also pleasant.
